name: Physic World
description:
Premise: 

  • It's a physics world with many kinds of magical effects, players will explore different interesting collisions, movements, and jumping in this world.

Control Tips:  

  • move left or right: A or D key
  • jump: W key

2-3 Things that  You Can Do:

  • Press the button to see the firework show
  • jump upon different bounding platform
  • find the item to change avatar color
